text: geudaeneun midneun sin-ang-indeul-ege daejeoghaneun ideul-eul yudaeingwa igyododeul gaundeseo balgyeonhalila ttohan geu daeneun ulineun gidoggyoindeul-iyo lagomalhamyeo midneun sin-ang-indeul-ege salang-eulpyosihaneun geudeul-eul balgyeonhalini i neun omanhaji anhneun seongjigjadeulgwa bae um-e yeoljunghaneun hagjadeul-ila
